name: react-config-forms
description: Dynamic form creation based on a config, powered by React.

scripts.publish-demo: git branch -D gh-pages; git push origin --delete gh-pages; git checkout -b gh-pages; cd demo-site; npm run build; cd ..; git add .; git add -f demo-site/dist; git add -f demo-site/node_modules/abas-demo-site/dist; git commit -m "Demo site build"; git push origin gh-pages; git checkout master; git push origin `git subtree split --prefix demo-site gh-pages`:gh-pages --force;

author: ABA Systems Pty Ltd
